Package edu.cnm.deepdive.dungeonrunclient.service

Class GoogleSignInService

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.dungeonrunclient.service.GoogleSignInService
  • public class GoogleSignInService
extends Object
    Encapsulates the Google sign in services needed to allow a user to sign in with their google account.

    • Method Summary

      Gets the instance of Google Sign in for users to be able to be attached to their individual id.

      A single Google sign in for user to log in.

      Refreshes the bearerToken to ensure the user is able to remain connected to the server when needed.

      • refresh

        public io.reactivex.Single<com.google.android.gms.auth.api.signin.GoogleSignInAccount> refresh()
        A single Google sign in for user to log in.
        Returns:
        Returns the logged in status with Google account, otherwise if log in is not successful user will not be logged in to their account.

      • refreshBearerToken

        public io.reactivex.Single<String> refreshBearerToken()
        Refreshes the bearerToken to ensure the user is able to remain connected to the server when needed.
        Returns:
        Returns the refreshed and updated bearerToken.

      • startSignIn

        public void startSignIn​(android.app.Activity activity,
                        int requestCode)
        For allowing the user to sign in to their Google account.
        Parameters:
        activity - Google sign in account activity for use to log in.
        requestCode - Gets a request code from Google to allow the user to prove they are the correct user logging in.

      • completeSignIn

        public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<com.google.android.gms.auth.api.signin.GoogleSignInAccount> completeSignIn​(android.content.Intent data)
        Completes the Google sign in and allows user to proceed in to the app when log in is successful.
        Parameters:
        data - data is an instance of the Intent to ensure the user to be logged in correctly.
        Returns:
        Returns the task for logging in upon completion of logging in.

      • signOut

        public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Void> signOut()
        Allows user to signOut of their Google sign in if they choose to.
        Returns:
        User is signed out when successfully completed.

      • setAccount

        public void setAccount​(com.google.android.gms.auth.api.signin.GoogleSignInAccount account)
        Sets the account information with the bearerToken to ensure a valid user connection.
        Parameters:
        account - account is an an instance of the GoogleSign in to know which account user is using.
